D​ead links and calculations which are in error with no support.

No support, no answered question. The course has not been updated for a long time. The data from the PV Watt calculator has been changed in the meantime. Very little or no practical information on surge protection design and conductor selection.
I like the course only for time to allow me to finish it
Quiz "Putting all together" is not right.

The best course I found on Solar Design. The only problem I noticed is that the trainer mentions course 1, course 2 and course 3 as part of a specialization that doesn't exist. Course 3 doesn't exist. We are hoping that this will be rectified.
over all a very good course for solar design and PV array sizing ..  Need a little more time for the Equipment sizing and selction section and also the state wise permits and NOC.

T​he concept with video, some reading, quiz and capstone is good. Easy to learn quit much in short time. Neal Abrams is presenting in a good and easy understandable way. I​mprovement 1. H​ave a defind path or selection of course included for a certain competence area, like solar power with connection to battery solution.I​mprovement 2.In case there is challenges or open question with something, a quiz question or question about something in the course material, there is no way to have support. Discussion forum exist, yes, but there in same questons asked many time over several years, without answers. Would be great to have possibility to have support from couse staff, based on mail, chat, teams meeting open for questions.
A well designed course . Helped me to have a clear under standing on solar system design.
Very helpful for getting knowledge related to planning and devlopment for solar energy.
The Course is great for learning and growth but some documents are not visible and we can not download them either.

question were very difficult to answer in any format other than exactly what was specified. ex to the nearest whole wat meant the entire formula needed to use rounded numbers and not just the final product. Which is obviously unclear and confusing,.
Very useful course , well explained
Great Course, But some minor error on the actual test instructions

Very interestign course. It´s ideal for those who already know the topic and want to make a whole review of it. I rate it 4 stars because it´s too focused on the USA, and doesn´t give us the same resources (like pvwatts) for the rest of America. Also the study of the america´s code should be something alternative.Anyway, it´s a great course, and very recommended.
Course is designed correctly to give overall idea about solar PV system design. Instructor is delivering  it with clarity. THANK YOU
Good material provided in course and well explained by the instructor.
Content and solar capstone project assignment task is good.
very helpful and added a valuable information to me.

It was really useful, informative course but I hope if you could add off-grid system design as well. I would like to thank New York University and Cousera who provide such useful courses all over the world for people seeking to develop their skills.
Best comprehensive course.
Very good content and excellent learning experience
Extremely helpful.
very productive course with a great instructor
I would like to thank ibrahim for this great course that taught me by asking questions that made me feel like I was in my school years.
Very useful course. Thank you!

Really like this course!
Especially after "Solar Design Basics"
Thank you !
Very competitive online course, it really  helps learners to learn with actual application through various exams along the way.  I love the way it shows.
Excellent course that is well explained and detailed, with quizzes that shows where your skills at and develop them even further in solar system design.
I​t was an amazing course which will give a basic understanding of Pv module sizing and about losses
b​est for engineers
VVery complete, excellent proffesor
T​he course is organised in such a manner that we learn whatever is necessary for Solar energy system design
L​oved this course. With a very practical perspective, it does not go deep into PV theory but focusses more on what you should know to design your own PV System. Overall I am very satisfied!
Excelente curso
It was a good course, lot of practical information was shared.
Great instructor and valuable knowledge, I highly recommend this course for any one needs to be a solar systems design engineer.
V​ery good.
Great introductory course to sizing PV systems.
I learned a lot and gained a bit more perpective about this field.
It was comprehensive everything about the solar system
muy buen curso!
Equally educational, practical and challenging
Excelente
​I learnt a great deal on how to size a PV system and choose appropriat PV modules and matching inverters.
Explanations are very clear and the exercises help you to understand the theoretical concepts. I'm really satisfied with this course.
Excellent course got a clear idea about solar farming.
this course is very knowledgefull and improved my knowledge in the field of solar enrgy through this courese.I want to say thanks to coursera and Mr. Neal Abrams sir too.

Excelente curso, he aprendido mucho con el. Recomiendo este curso a toda persona interesada en iniciar su formación en  el diseño de sistemas fotovoltaicos. Fue una experienca edificadora y  satisfactoria durante todo el curso.
Great practical course for anyone wanting to understand how to design a PV system. Professor Neal Abrams has done a great job in hosting this course. I found the entire course very enjoyable.
Awesome experience to learn from Neil Abram sir
Very good specialization

I'm so Happy to attend this course in coursera, over this course all details are good and in depth of knowlaedge given by professor and coursera platform.I happy to attend next some course on cousera further.🙂👍
good info about different losses and site selection, inverter and modules selection

Only suggestion I want to give is that to make sure that the answers in the assignments are solved and given a proper explanation. Rest it was an amazing course with lot of interesting things to learn about solar PV systems.
Excellent!!!
Very useful course, I recommend it to anyone needs to know the basics for Solar Energy System Design.
Great course!! I am waiting for the solar site Design course!!!
g​ood
A very informative and skill building course. Instructor was great.
T​hanks for interesting course.
I really enjoyed the training, it was tasking and challenging but well equipped. I am glad that I was able to run the training. Thanks to Dr. Nel Abrams and the entire cousera.
Excellent course, very clear explanations and content
I want to leave my contribution, so that the evaluation system of other colleagues is improved, meaning that we can download or copy the work in a more user-friendly way.
G​ood point to start your journey in designing a solar pv systems
G​ood content. The quiz will drive you crazy because some answers to the quizzes are wrong (check the discussion forum). Overall I learnt a lot, thank you!
I learned a lot of skills pertaining Solar Energy
Excellent
Good course. Strike a great balance between theory and practice. I really enjoy it.
Excellent Course !! It opened my interest in solar energy and allowed me to design a solar installation in a good way. Thank you very much to the University and the professors.
Among last few courses I have done here, This is most interesting & full of learnings for Solar Design Engineers.
excellent course
Just overwhelmed by the learning and outcome i obtained from the course. The course provides detailed study and understanding associated with respective stream.
Excellent course ! Great contents
Excellent course for the busy professional to enhance their knowledge and skills in PV Designing from the reputed institute.
It was amazing, This course helped me to see how important is the solar energy. Also this course helped me get my studies on track.
It would be great if battery backed up systems are also covered in the course
It taught me a lot that i did not know about. It was put together great.
Thanks Coursera!

It was really very interesting but tough academic journey of my life. Many times frustrated for not clearing the tests....finally got it...At some places more explanations and examples must be included.
informative and useful course
good
This course is excellent, I recommend it
Well prepared and complete for understanding of Solar Systems, components and installation
Very useful and detailed course on Solar systems
Thanks a lot.
This Course is very useful for my Research Work
Very informative course. Enjoyed it
In this Coursera course you have not mention battery selection,mppt tech. So this knowledge is not enough
This course has helped me to understand more parameters for solar energy system design
An important course for any Solar system designer taught by an excellent tutor

I needed this course for my academic purposes, it is really well designed course and will take you to the depth of solar system design. If you are electrical engineer and need to understand the basics of solar system design you should definitely go for it.
Very good course.
I LIKED SO MUCH THIS COURSE!!GREAT JOB!!
very useful and informative
great
very well structured course
Excelente curso!

really a great course , i would like to give a special thanks to Mr Neal Abrams  for the great work i appreciate the effort he made to elaborate such an amazing course , looking forword to learn more from that wonderful Professor .
This course is useful to learn or gain knowledge in solar energy system
The best teacher 😁
easy to understand and well-organized course
this is a course to where you design and spec a PV system, it is well presented and i have learnt many new things . a big thanks to prof Neal Abrams

Amazing course. I learned a lot from this. Very simple and easy to understand classes. Every scenarios were explained through simple examples make the study much more easy. I recommend to follow this course with out any hesitation.
magnificent course.  I learned a lot in these weeks with all the tasks, bibliographic references and with the elaboration of the final project.My favorite course so far.
The course is very focused and use of simple language and examples makes the concept pretty clear. Excellent content and you will end up with good knowledge on Solar Energy System.
It was a useful course, and I really learned a lot.
It was really good course. I understood the practical version of solar system designing.
This course is really great. I learned a lot and boost my confidence by adding new sets of skills.

This course was very helpful to me in understanding how to design a solar system based on different environmental condition. I applaud SUNY for coming up with such an effective course regarding solar energy system design.

Great Course, the syllabus covered all the necessary topics in designing a grid connected solar system. Moreover, the lecture delivery style of the instructor was very engaging, which allowed me to finish the course before deadline.
I think its the best course !!
Teacher is very elaborative and explained each concept so nicely. Thankfully now i can design solar systems for net metering. Thanks Professor Neal Abrams and Coursera

Really good course for the design of ongrid PV systems: a lot of practical advice on how to dimension  this kind of PV systems. What could be added (but maybe this also for another course): how to design grid independent systems with battery storage and what are (ranges for) prices, on what do they depend etc.
Good introduction in system sizing and calculation of losses
Excellent course.
it is a good course to take
Excellent Coourse
